message:
2019-01-06

=====Material URLs=====

Video: https://edition.cnn.com/2018/12/12/cnn10/ten-content-thurs/index.html

Transcript: http://transcripts.cnn.com/TRANSCRIPTS/1812/13/sn.01.html

오늘은 영국의 Brexit와 영국 총리의 고뇌에 대한 이야기를 다룹니다. 왜 영국 총리는 지금 고뇌하고 있는지 확인해보세요.

Today we're talking about Brexit in England and the agony of the British Prime Minister. Check out why the British prime minister is in trouble.

====Video Contents====

00:00 - 01:55
Michael Cohen, a former lawyer for the U.S. president, is sentenced to three years in federal prison.

01:55 - 06:10
A confidence vote concerning Britain's prime minister.

06:10 - 08:45
What drug is now considered to be the most deadly in America.
